description.fr: Enfourner le gâteau pendant 40 à 45 minutes à 180°C (th. 6)
description.en: Bake the cake for 40 to 45 minutes at 180°C (th. 6)

tips.fr:
Ne pas ouvrir le four pendant les 30 premières minutes
Le gâteau est cuit quand il se détache des bords et qu'un couteau ressort sec
Laisser tiédir avant de démouler
tips.en:
Don't open the oven during the first 30 minutes
The cake is done when it pulls away from the edges and a knife comes out dry
Let cool before unmolding
tips.ko:
처음 30분 동안 오븐을 열지 말기
케이크가 가장자리에서 떨어지고 칼이 마르게 나오면 완성
틀에서 빼기 전에 식히기
